name: Peaceful Day of the Irrelevant
description:
This is the game I made out of boredom from the lockdown. I am thinking of a perfect protagonist without being a Mary Sue and this is the result.  A story looking through the eyes of a minor character.

Thank you for those generous people for giving me such great sprites:

  • じべたゆか＠お仕事募集中
